mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "REVIEW" VALUES(SEQ_REVIEW_NO.NEXTVAL, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{memberNo}, 2, #{thumnail})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "REVIEW" WHERE REVIEW_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE = 2
SELECT REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_TITLE, THUMNAIL FROM "REVIEW" WHERE REVIEW_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE = 2 ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC

SELECT REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, READ_COUNT, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, TO_CHAR(REVIEW_WRITE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REVIEW_WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR(REVIEW_UPDATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REVIEW_UPDATE_DATE FROM "REVIEW" JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE REVIEW_DEL_FL='N' AND BOARD_CODE = 2 AND REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
